text: Ruslan Jamshidov (born 22 August 1979) is a retired Kyrgyzstani footballer who is a striker. He last played for Alga Bishkek. He was a member of the Kyrgyzstan national football team. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Kyrgyzstan national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |1999||3||0 |- |2000||3||0 |- |2001||6||0 |- |2006||7||1 |- |2007||4||2 |- |2008||3||0 |- |2009||1||0 |- |2011||1||0 |- !Total||28||3 |} Statistics accurate as of match played 28 July 2011 ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
